items.title: More than 120 Ukraine drones enter Russia with Moscow targeted, Defense Ministry says
items.description: Russia's Defense Ministry said its forces downed at least 126 Ukrainian drones overnight into Thursday morning, with at least three craft intercepted ...

items.title: Trump admin live updates: Senate narrowly approves $9 billion budget claw back
items.description: President Trump was asked on Wednesday about Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell amid reports that Trump had indicated to allies he would fire him.

items.title: WATCH:  Mysterious Pride flag-wearing robot spotted in Hollywood
items.description: Some California motorists were shocked to see a cowboy hat-wearing robot draped in Pride flags running through West Hollywood.

items.title: WATCH:  Stealthy squirrel steals chicken snack from stroller at EPCOT
items.description: "Good for you, bud," one impressed onlooker could be heard saying as the crafty critter made its getaway.
